title: Mug Shot
description: T.S. is assigned to protect Adam Dalton a music magazine editor who becomes mixed up in a criminal conspiracy.

title: Killing Time
description: A man whom Taler put away for murder when she was D.A. has escaped. It seems that he was convicted because Taler got his daughter who saw him do it, to testify against him. Now they fear he's going to go after his daughter. But Turner doesn't think that's whom he is going after.
